Hi Folks,
             Do we have a wiki page describing the best practises=
 and
useful tips
when setting up multiple heritrix crawlers for doing large=
 crawls ?
 
Such a page could start out with a simple large crawl example a=
nd can
also
have a list of potential issues that one is likely to face in l=
arge
crawls.
This  issue list can be expanded by users from their eperience=
s.
 
Thanks
-Ankur
